import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function SwimmingPoolInspectionModal() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); return (
{/* Trigger Button */}
Hi
{/* Modal */} {isOpen && (
{/* Close Button */} {/* Header */}

SWIMMING POOL INSPECTION CHECKLIST

CONFIDENTIAL – FACILITY SAFETY DOCUMENTATION

{/* SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION */}

SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION

{/* Checklist Sections */} {[ { title: "POOL SAFETY & STRUCTURE", items: [ "Pool area is securely fenced with gates", "“No Diving” and depth signs posted clearly", "Pool deck free of trip hazards and debris", "Safety equipment available (life rings, poles)", "Pool tiles and surfaces are intact and not slippery", "Drain covers secured", "Emergency contact posted" ] }, { title: "WATER QUALITY & MAINTENANCE", items: [ "Water clarity allows visibility of bottom", "Chlorine/Bromine levels within safe range", "pH levels within recommended range (7.2–7.8)", "Skimmers and filters clean and operational", "Regular backwashing and chemical logs maintained", "No visible algae or debris in water" ] }, { title: "CHANGING ROOMS & FACILITIES", items: [ "Changing rooms/toilets clean and ventilated", "Showers functional and clean", "Floors dry or have anti-slip mats", "Soap/hand sanitizer and toilet paper available" ] }, { title: "STAFF & EMERGENCY READINESS", items: [ "Certified lifeguard(s) on duty during pool use", "First aid kit fully stocked and accessible", "Emergency procedures posted and understood by staff", "Staff trained in CPR and emergency response", "Logbook of water testing up to date" ] } ].map((section, idx) => (

SECTION {idx + 2}: {section.title}

{section.items.map((item, i) => ( ))}
Item √ / ⤫ / N/A Comments
{item}
))} {/* SECTION 6: ISSUES IDENTIFIED / ACTIONS REQUIRED */}

SECTION 6: ISSUES IDENTIFIED / ACTIONS REQUIRED

{[1, 2, 3].map((i) => (
))}
{/* SECTION 7: SIGN-OFF */}

SECTION 7: SIGN-OFF

• Immediate hazards must result in the temporary closure of the pool.
• Maintain a copy of each inspection on file for regulatory and internal review.

)}
); }
